content.title: Then I turned and noticed, behind me—a third chair.
content.author: Henrik Karlsson
content.quote_text: Then I turned and noticed, behind me — a third chair.

generation.prompt: Mark Rothko style color field composition with large luminous areas of color that seem to breathe and glow from within, soft edges between color zones creating gentle transitions, colors chosen for emotional and spiritual resonance, minimal composition inviting contemplation and meditation.
